"Photon Blasts":
"Photon blasts are special attacks usable by Mags that
have evolved into their second form or higher.
When triggered, the Mag transforms into a massive creature
and unleashes a powerful attack. Players fill the blast gauge
required to trigger a photon blast by fighting with a Mag equipped.
When you learn a photon blast, be sure to add it to your subpalette."

"Once your blast gauge is full, you can trigger a photon blast
from the subpalette.

There are a variety of photon blasts, and different types are
available depending on the Mag you have.

Select a photon blast that matches your combat style."
